javax.ejb

Interface MessageDrivenContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EJBContext

    public interface MessageDrivenContext
extends EJBContext
    The MessageDrivenContext interface provides access to the runtime message-driven context that the container provides for a message-driven bean instance. The container passes the MessageDrivenContext interface to an instance after the instance has been created. The message-driven context remains associated with the instance for the lifetime of the instance.
    Since:
    EJB 2.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface javax.ejb.EJBContext

        getCallerIdentity, getCallerPrincipal, getContextData, getEJBHome, getEJBLocalHome, getEnvironment, getRollbackOnly, getTimerService, getUserTransaction, isCallerInRole, isCallerInRole, lookup, setRollbackOnly
